Body: When you buy a certain number of ERC-20 tokens, your ownership of them is recorded in a smart contract - it doesn't matter what specific tokens were. Because they are interchangeable and the same.  But the value of one ERC721 token is not the same as that of another ERC-721 token. Because they are not interchangeable and unique. Title: [ANN] Aeryus - Discover. Disrupt. Decentralize. [Bounty][mobile app]
